article:
This is a 'list of [[periodicals]]' published by the '[[Seventh-day Adventist
Church]]' or by its church members. They include both official and unofficial
publications relating to Seventh-day Adventism. Magazines which are only
available on the internet are not included.

Most periodicals are listed by location of the publisher. A brief list of the
most circulated periodicals is also included.
